name: agi-cosmic-fullstack
description: AGI Cosmic Full Stack Application - 3D Solar System with AI Chat

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env

author: ashfiai <raelei333@gmail.com>
